channel.title: Comments on: A Welcomed Invasion
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
Thank you so much for reading it, Jeff! Yes, those were characters from PAWNS. I like to have cross-overs in my stories. The hot dog vendor in Frayed was based on Manuel. I wrote that scene before I started Frayed and wanted to work that character into a story somehow.
enCompass is an amalgam of trends I've seen in social media games as well as some ideas I have had for iPhone apps. It is part Gowalla, part Epic Win, part augmented reality, plus lots of other parts thrown in.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you so much for reading it, Jeff! Yes, those were characters from PAWNS. I like to have cross-overs in my stories. The hot dog vendor in Frayed was based on Manuel. I wrote that scene before I started Frayed and wanted to work that character into a story somehow.

enCompass is an amalgam of trends I’ve seen in social media games as well as some ideas I have had for iPhone apps. It is part Gowalla, part Epic Win, part augmented reality, plus lots of other parts thrown in.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Thanks for posting the story -- I enjoyed it. Made me laugh out loud at certain times (the office and Krav Maga scenes). A number of the other scenes brought up some unsettling concepts and imagery.
Did I notice a few cameos from our PAWNS game? The Technomancer, Golem, and the Queen? Manuel reminded me of the hot dog vendor in Frayed. Wish I could find a wise vendor somewhere who could get my life straightened out....
I think I read about a real-life game that was like enCompass. Can't remember what it was called, though.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting the story — I enjoyed it. Made me laugh out loud at certain times (the office and Krav Maga scenes). A number of the other scenes brought up some unsettling concepts and imagery.

Did I notice a few cameos from our PAWNS game? The Technomancer, Golem, and the Queen? Manuel reminded me of the hot dog vendor in Frayed. Wish I could find a wise vendor somewhere who could get my life straightened out….

I think I read about a real-life game that was like enCompass. Can’t remember what it was called, though.
